products.title: Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Round out a muted palette with this mid-gloss grey satin perfect fit. Its clay tones pair well with pastel decor, with a gentle sheen that catches the light without creating sunglare. Their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for high-traffic or humid spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Silver Sparkle Perfect Fit
products.description: Classic grey gets a shimmering upgrade with their silver sparkle perfect fit. Perfect for adding a bit of glitz to your kitchen, conservatory or patio door, its glitterbomb flecks dance in the light for a captivating take on conventional monochrome styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their slate grey colour - a tone that is perfect for sleek, modern, and sophisticated decor schemes. products.title: Cellular Blackout Taupe Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.description: Hivelussosteel perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive lusso steel grey perfect fit pleated blind px80205.

products.title: Splash Blackout Kamanu Slate Roller Blind
products.description: Now if there was a checklist for choosing a window dressing for the bathroom, we think it should certainly have the following; aquatic pattern, waterproof material and a whole lot of style. And this splash kamanu slate roller blind has all three. Part of their harlequin additions now if there was a checklist for choosing a window dressing for the bathroom, we think it should certainly have the following; aquatic pattern, waterproof material and a whole lot of style.

products.title: Splash Blackout Kamanu Amber Roller Blind
products.description: Warm and cosy, yet incredibly cool, this splash kamanu amber roller blind features beautifully detailed aquatic creatures, a sense of movement and gentility swimming through them. This blind really has everything going for it. Not only is it part of their harlequin additions colle warm and cosy, yet incredibly cool, this splash kamanu amber roller blind features beautifully detailed aquatic creatures, a sense of movement and gentility swimming through them.

products.title: Splash Blackout Kamanu Zest Roller Blind
products.description: Did you ever think that a fish design could look so sophisticated? Neither did we until we saw the remarkable kamanu pattern from harlequin. Teamed with an exclusive colourway and practical pvc fabric, this roller blind is quite something. The splash kamanu zest roller blind is did you ever think that a fish design could look so sophisticated? Neither did we until we saw the remarkable kamanu pattern from harlequin.

products.title: Indira, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The indira charcoal is a unique and eye-catching roman blind featuring an array of beautifully drawn elephants surrounded by intricate patterning. The charcoal background is the perfect canvas for the creamy grey oatmeal of the imagery, and offsets it wonderfully. Team the charcoal with other charcoal greys, the occasional navy blue, and plenty of matching cream for cosy yet moody look in a den or sitting room, where warmth and comfort always come first.

products.title: Silver Birch, Willow - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract trees and blossoms of the silver birch range are this time coloured in mustard yellow, turquoise aqua, and soft coral tones, tempered by greys and whites in the willow offering. The hushed yet pretty hues of the willow would be well-suited to adding just a hint of colour to an otherwise white or neutral room, where the aim is to keep the space feeling light, airy, and breathable. This could work beautifully in a utility room or downstairs cloakroom where space is limited and light is needed.

products.title: Foliage, Slate Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Beautifully understated, the foliage in slate blue places autumn images of leaves in summer colours of pale teal and soft biscuit on a creamy white background. The end result is one of light and airiness, making it a subtle addition to complement any contemporary dcor. Place the slate blue in a relaxed living room or bedroom for a serene and peaceful ambience. Surround it with similar tones of cream, teal, and biscuit, with the occasional golden tone for added depth and personality.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral.

products.title: Bird Garden, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Certain to provide any space with modern vintage chic, the bird garden in charcoal displays an array of lovely birds and blooming florals in a snow white shade on a bed of distressed grey. This blind is pretty and sweet, absolute in forming a delightfully balmy and airy casual ambience in any surrounding. Combine the delicate grey shades with a vibrant mustard yellow for modern impact, or with a rich aubergine for ultimate contrast.

products.title: Baa Baa, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: A sweet and subtle blind, the baa baa in charcoal offers a grainy, dove grey canvas adorned with sheep illustrations in checked, argyle, and striped patterns coloured in charcoal, slate, and stone greys. The roman folds provide neatness and structure, giving a lovely, curved aesthetic. Keep the nursery low-key, yet still full of personality, with the characterful charcoal. Join it with gentle whites and similar greys, opting for contemporary, chalk-painted furniture and soft woollen fabrics.

products.title: Hex, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashionable dove grey unites with a sleek off-white on the delicately textured hex stone. The colour and shapes are well-suited, with their contemporary feel and utilitarian aesthetic. Hang the stone in a teenager's bedroom, strengthening with bold brights, such as poppy red, cobalt blue, or mustard yellow. Alternatively, combine with pretty pastels, such as baby blue, vintage pink, or mint green.

products.title: Hedgehog, Flint - Roman Blind
products.description: If you love the cosiness of country-style dcor, and can't help but add wildlife themes to your home, you'll love the hedgehog in flint. Sharply sketched - and very cute - hedgehogs, in black and white, sit on a stone grey canvas, keeping the look simple without minimalism. Use the flint for a woodland themed nursery, sitting it against off-white or cream walls, and matching to soft grey and white tones throughout the room.

products.title: Harriet, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: If you love country-style dcor with a contemporary twist, then you'll just adore the harriet graphite. Harriet the hen is drawn in several different sketched designs, all in blacks, taupes, and greys on a plain white background, creating a look that's simple yet effective. Place this stylish roman blind in the kitchen, amongst classic rural dcor, such as neutral tones and natural woods. Don't be afraid to add a few extra farmyard characters into the mix - who doesn't love a pig, cow, or chicken in their kitchen?Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Superstar, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: The superstar in graphite uses its typical sketched star shapes to offer a strong blend of blacks, reds, and blues, resulting in a fun yet studious blind that will add a fresh and contemporary aesthetic wherever it's hung. Use the graphite in the playroom or den, where children of all ages will appreciate it. Match to a blue carpet, light walls, and red soft furnishings. Use light to medium woods to retain that modern feeling, and opt for glossy silver finishings.

products.title: Allium, Slate Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The allium in slate blue features a baby blue background adorned with delicate blossoms in blue and green tones that bring to mind a somewhat nautical look. The resulting feel is cool, calm, and collected, with an ambience of tranquillity. Use the slate blue to provide your kitchen with a refreshing vibe to keep the room feeling peaceful all day long. Surround with similar blues, accenting occasionally with sage and forest greens for a natural look and feel.

products.title: Owl, Flint - Roman Blind
products.description: A wildlife-inspired blind in neutral monochrome, the owl in flint features alert-looking owls sketched onto a stone grey background, and the look is simple yet effective. The cotton fabric ensures a sturdy yet pliable quality that will sit neatly in the folds of a classic roman blind. Choose a contemporary yet country vibe in your living room, by using the flint as part of a monochrome colour scheme, including grey couches, white walls, and black accenting.

products.title: Bergen, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Bang on trend, the bergen in grey mixes a fashionable grey and yellow combo with a totally contemporary take on floral patterning. Think deep mustards, cool stones, and striking slates, tempered by off-white shading as backgrounds for the flowers. The grey would make the perfect addition to a cool and collected office or study, opting for white or lightly toned furniture, and accessorising with pale and slate grey soft furnishings, throwing in the occasional mustard for depth and good measure.

products.title: Wild Meadow, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: In subdued slate and biscuit tones, the wild meadow in charcoal displays artistically drawn blooms with sketched foliage, all sat on a homely cream base. The fabric itself is a lightweight, linen-look cloth, creating the perfect plain canvas for this work of art. Temper deeper greys or richer browns in a contemporary living room by hanging the charcoal against a bold feature wall. Use more neutral creams and oatmeals for your sofas and carpets, and choose between brushed silver or tarnished gold for fittings and fixtures.

products.title: Splash Blackout Scribble Stem Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Retro inspiration combined with contemporary chic, this gorgeous roller is a stylish and practical way to dress your bathroom window. From their orla kiely house collection, the signature stem pattern climbing the fabric is rendered in cool grey and black, texturised by a scribb retro inspiration combined with contemporary chic, this gorgeous roller is a stylish and practical way to dress your bathroom window.

products.title: Splash Blackout Scribble Stem Seagrass Roller Blind
products.description: One of orlas signature patterns, the stem design climbs this fabric in orderly columns for a delightfully different vertical stripe pattern that bounces with cheerful style. The muted colourway keeps the look balanced and natural, with deep greens, pastel blue and crisp grey one of orlas signature patterns, the stem design climbs this fabric in orderly columns for a delightfully different vertical stripe pattern that bounces with cheerful style.

products.title: Splash Blackout Early Bird Granite Roller Blind
products.description: Cute, cheerful and delightfully bright, this splash early bird granite roller blind is a thoroughly lovable addition to their orla kiely house collection. Nestled among the iconic stem pattern are those cute and uplifting little birds, guaranteed to put a smile on your face ever cute, cheerful and delightfully bright, this splash early bird granite roller blind is a thoroughly lovable addition to their orla kiely house collection.

products.title: Splash Blackout Tiny Stem Cool Grey Roller Blind
products.description: A contemporary beauty with a cheerfully charming touch, this roller from their orla kiely house collection is the perfect way to bring some uplifting vibes to a smart, modern bathroom. The chic grey shade of the material is the perfect contrast for white surroundings, and with o a contemporary beauty with a cheerfully charming touch, this roller from their orla kiely house collection is the perfect way to bring some uplifting vibes to a smart, modern bathroom.

products.title: Splash Blackout Tiny Stem Zest Roller Blind
products.description: Make every moment you spend in your bathroom feel like summer, with the splash tiny stem zest roller blind from their orla kiely house collection. The golden yellow material is emblazoned with orlas iconic stem pattern, miniaturised to pack in as many rows of cheerful little le make every moment you spend in your bathroom feel like summer, with the splash tiny stem zest roller blind from their orla kiely house collection.

products.title: Splash Blackout Linear Stem Cool Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Practicality doesnt have to come at the cost of style, and this chic roller from their orla kiely house collection is proof positive that you can have your cake and eat it too. The iconic stem pattern stands proud in its bright shade against the deep grey backing, which is a go practicality doesnt have to come at the cost of style, and this chic roller from their orla kiely house collection is proof positive that you can have your cake and eat it too.
